categories: Category:Songs by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes

nodes.text: "Dune Sea Special" was a popular music piece. In 0 BBY, on the day that Luke Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi met Han Solo and Chewbacca, the band Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes performed that piece at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina in Mos Eisley, after playing "Mad About Me." Even after the Modal Nodes moved on, the cantina's house bands kept playing "Dune Sea Special," along with other hits.
